title: Paying top dollar for t206 all backs except pied/sc--
author: forazzurri2axz

posts.post_title: Paying top dollar for t206 all backs except pied/sc--
posts.post_content:
I am looking to BUY many T206's I need with all backs OTHER THAN Piedmont or Sweet Cap and am offering very high buy prices...Have put together a spreadsheet of buying prices based on grade, common, HOF etc. Prefer PSA graded, minimum PSA 3 through PSA 6, but will consider SGC if very tough backs

If anyone has some they are looking to sell, please email me at [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url] and I will forward my "buy price spreadsheet" Prices are definitely reasonable and based on current high values

Thanks in advance 

Bill Latzko
